commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas0abdfd5"

diff:
"0abdfd5 bug 395246 - link null plugin with static CRT to avoid Microsoft.VC80.CRT SxS errors.  r=bsmedberg a=mconnor
diff --git a/modules/plugin/samples/default/windows/Makefile.in b/modules/plugin/samples/default/windows/Makefile.in
index 2407d2d..eb60fd1 100644
--- a/modules/plugin/samples/default/windows/Makefile.in
+++ b/modules/plugin/samples/default/windows/Makefile.in
@@ -73,6 +73,9 @@ FORCE_SHARED_LIB = 1
 # Force use of PIC
 FORCE_USE_PIC	= 1
 
+# must link statically with the CRT to avoid problems with VC8
+USE_STATIC_LIBS = 1
+
 NO_DIST_INSTALL	= 1
 NO_INSTALL = 1
 
"
